entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call is important to us. Please hold while we connect you with an agent.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, my name is Alex. How can I help you today?
Hi Alex, I recently received a bike I ordered from your website, and I'm having some issues with it.
I'm sorry to hear that. Can you tell me more about the problem?

Well, when I unboxed it, I noticed the frame has a noticeable crack, it's a pretty bad cracked frame. Also, one of the wheels seems really wobbly. I think it might be due to shipping damage, honestly.

Oh no, that sounds terrible! I sincerely apologize for the condition your bike arrived in. That's certainly not the VeloFit experience we want you to have. It sounds like there was some serious shipping damage.
To resolve this for you immediately, I'm going to offer a full refund for the bike. Would that be acceptable?
Yes, a full refund would be great.

Excellent. I'll process that for you right away. Also, so you don't have to worry about returning the damaged bike, I'll email you a free label for shipping. You can use it to send the bike back to us at your convenience.
A free label? That's wonderful, thank you so much!

You're very welcome! The refund should reflect in your account within 7-10 business days. And you'll receive an email with the free label within the next hour. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that covers everything. Thank you so much for your help, Alex. You've been great!
My pleasure! We appreciate your business with VeloFit. Have a wonderful day!
